column8: P1. Leave the policy settings as they are.
column9: P2. Policies that emphasise economic growth over climate change adaptation or mitigation.
column10: P3. Policies that involve a dramatic cut back in CO2 emissions (by 50% in the next 10 years).
column11: P4. Policies that involve a moderate cut in CO2 emissions (by 25% in over the next 10 years).
column12: P5. Adaptation policies and expenditure (e.g. coastal protection, water desalinisation, improving infrastructure etc). Planning controls and emergency response programs.
column13: P6. Adaptation policies that target individual, small business or community-based actions (eg support the installation of alternative energy generators, insulation, water use efficiency)
column14: P7. Preparing for climate risk through the development of new approaches and technologies that enhance resilience to the impacts of climate variability or change.
